message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Administrative Expenses" is the line item that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity. 

From the income statement provided, the value for Administrative Expenses is 271886.07 as of 2024-02-05.

Therefore, the value of costs related to general management and administration is 271886.07.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '271886.07'}}
```
